plot outline: Comprised of four interconnected chapters, in the first chapter we see four young men undertaking a shady and risky venture for a huge sum of money when one among them faces a crisis. Chapter two is about a middle-aged man boarding a bus with a huge sum of money anxious and suspicious of his fellow passengers. In the third chapter, six youngsters set out on a journey, a mission, to register the marriage of two their friends, who have eloped. The final chapter shifts focus to a mother watching over her son in the hospital waiting for her husband to come, as time and her hopes slip away.
title: Chapters
plot: Different people who are in serious crisis see a ray of hope when their lives get interlinked in an unexpected turn of events
